name: Muhammad Anas
tagline: I like to create software that solves real world problems
aboutme: Hey there, my name's anas, I'm a full stack developer, i like to create software that solve's real world problems, i've been coding since i was 15, i specialize in MERN Stack, I'm a constant learner, self-starter and have an entrepreneurial mindset with a can do attitude.

projects.name: Glask
projects.projectDescription: Glask is an ecommerce store built with MERN Stack, tailwind and redux.

projects.name: Betalk
projects.projectDescription: A real time chat application built with React, Styled components and Socket.io

projects.name: Portfolio Template
projects.projectDescription: An open source portfolio template i created for developers.
